lead_paragraph: BERNE, Switzerland, July 31 -In a broadcast to the Italian people over a station calling itself "Radio Leghorn" tonight, the five Left Wing parties that proclaimed their unity "for the purpose of achieving peace" called on "workers of northern Italy" to refuse further collaboration with the Badoglio government because it had failed in its duties.
abstract: 5 left-wing Ital pol parties charge Badoglio ready to hand over Ital fleet to Gers in exch for attempts to neutralize Italy
